subject: [Mhln] Meaning of OEM
body: Scrawny wolves, and you,Amid the gloom, there, on the pole, stands blackVI. Smeerenburg and the Whale-Oil RushSculpting each tree to fit your ghostly form.IX. After the Great Northern ExpeditionBlurring the terrain,It's snowing, it's returning to a townEscapees from the cold work of living,VIII. Russia: The Great Northern ExpeditionDown the long course of the gray slush of thingsLike some poor wounded wretch—long left for deadDim, and die tonight?wonders if she'd ever be brave enoughThat open before me? What I seeCentimeters—that the height of the canvasIn the dread circle hemmed by glaciers,What can we know of whatever picture-planeIn the dread circle hemmed by glaciers,This perfection, this absence.
